name: wpilib
description: WPILib is the software library package for the FIRST Robotics Competition. The core install includes wpiutil, a common utilies library, and ntcore, the base NetworkTables library.

allwpilib.description: This option will build the HAL and wpilibc/j during the build. The HAL is the simulation HAL, unless the external HAL options are used. The CMake build has no capability to build for the roboRIO.

cameraserver.description: This option will cause cscore to be built. Turning this off will implicitly disable cameraserver. If this is off, the OpenCV build requirement is removed.

gui.description: This option will build GUI items. If this is off, and simulationmodules is on, the simulation GUI will not be built.

ntcore.description: This option will cause ntcore to be built. Turning this off will implicitly disable wpinet, and will cause an error if allwpilib is enabled.

protobuf.description: This option will build with the protobuf library.

simulationmodules.description: This option will build simulation modules.

wpimath.description: This option will build the wpimath library. This option must be on to build wpilib.
